data.comment: The big names in today's match at The Hawthorns have now been confirmed.
The match has started at The Hawthorns.
In the minute 1, Crystal Palace awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can West Bromwich capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crystal Palace's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in West Bromwich.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Crystal Palace.
Free kick for West Bromwich in the half of Crystal Palace.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
In the minute 4, Crystal Palace's Wilfried Zaha misses with an attempt on goal.
West Bromwich have a goal kick.
West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, In West Bromwich a free kick has been awarded the away team.
An unfortunate own goal by Darnell Furlong makes the score 0-1.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to West Bromwich in their own half.
In the minute 10, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Crystal Palace is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Crystal Palace have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 13, Matheus Pereira for West Bromwich drives towards goal at The Hawthorns. But the finish is unsuccessful.
West Bromwich drives forward and Matheus Pereira gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
In the minute 15, Throw-in high up the field for Crystal Palace in West Bromwich.
Paul Tierney awards the home team a throw-in.
Wilfried Zaha of Crystal Palace gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 16, Goal kick for West Bromwich at The Hawthorns.
Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
Romaine Sawyers for West Bromwich has been booked by Paul Tierney and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 18, West Bromwich drive upfield at The Hawthorns and Darnell Furlong hits the bar with a header.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in their own half.
West Bromwich to take a throw-in in Crystal Palace territory.
In the minute 19, West Bromwich pushes forward through Conor Gallagher, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace at The Hawthorns.
Throw-in for West Bromwich in the half of Crystal Palace.
In the minute 21, Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
Throw-in for West Bromwich at The Hawthorns.
Free kick West Bromwich.
In the minute 24, Paul Tierney blows against West Bromwich's Kyle Bartley for offside.
Can West Bromwich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to West Bromwich.
In the minute 25, Free kick for West Bromwich in the half of Crystal Palace.
Matt Phillips gets his shot on target but fails to score for West Bromwich.
Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Free kick Crystal Palace.
Crystal Palace's Christian Benteke is on target but unsuccessful.
Goal! West Bromwich go level at 1-1 through Conor Gallagher in West Bromwich.
In the minute 30, Darnell Furlong instrumental with a fine assist.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to West Bromwich.
At The Hawthorns, Matheus Pereira is shown a red card and sent off.
In the minute 35, Paul Tierney signals a throw-in for West Bromwich, close to Crystal Palace's area.
Paul Tierney awards the away team a throw-in.
In West Bromwich a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 38, Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Important block from the West Bromwich defence as Jeffrey Schlupp fires in a strike for Crystal Palace.
In the minute 39, Gary Cahill (Crystal Palace) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to West Bromwich in their own half.
In the minute 40, Free kick Crystal Palace.
West Bromwich have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
In West Bromwich, Karlan Ahearne-Grant of West Bromwich is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to West Bromwich.
Crystal Palace are pushing forward but Eberechi Eze's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a West Bromwich goal kick.
In the minute 45, At The Hawthorns, Crystal Palace are penalized for being offside.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Paul Tierney awards West Bromwich a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Paul Tierney signals a West Bromwich throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
The first-half is over.
Paul Tierney has blown to start the second-half.
Throw-in Crystal Palace.
In the minute 46, Filip Krovinovic is replacing Grady Diangana for West Bromwich at The Hawthorns.
Crystal Palace drive forward but Christian Benteke is judged offside.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of West Bromwich.
West Bromwich will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Crystal Palace.
Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
In the minute 49, James McArthur is booked for the away team.
Crystal Palace are coming forward and Christian Benteke gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
West Bromwich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 52, Crystal Palace push forward at The Hawthorns and Wilfried Zaha gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined West Bromwich defence.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace close to the penalty box.
In the minute 53, Patrick Van Aanholt of Crystal Palace smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Crystal Palace drive upfield and Wilfried Zaha gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a West Bromwich defender.
In the minute 54, Crystal Palace's Wilfried Zaha gets in a shot but it is blocked by a West Bromwich defender.
In the minute 55, Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Christian Benteke (Crystal Palace) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Jeffrey Schlupp (Crystal Palace) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Wilfried Zaha puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
James McArthur with an assist there.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Can West Bromwich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
Corner awarded to West Bromwich.
In the minute 58, Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
Conor Gallagher (West Bromwich) has received a first yellow card.
Goal! Christian Benteke extends Crystal Palace lead to 1-3 with a header.
In the minute 59, Great play from Patrick Van Aanholt to set up the goal.
Crystal Palace push forward at The Hawthorns and Patrick Van Aanholt gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined West Bromwich defence.
West Bromwich's Karlan Ahearne-Grant has run offside.
In the minute 62, The home team have replaced Karlan Ahearne-Grant with Callum Robinson. This is the second substitution made today by Slaven Bilic.
Ball safe as West Bromwich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a West Bromwich goal kick.
In the minute 65, Free kick for West Bromwich in the half of Crystal Palace.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Great finish from Wilfried Zaha to give Crystal Palace a 1-4 lead.
In the minute 68, That's a fine assist from Eberechi Eze.
West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
In West Bromwich Crystal Palace's Christian Benteke is caught offside.
In the minute 71, West Bromwich have a goal kick.
Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in West Bromwich territory.
Roy Hodgson (Crystal Palace) is making a first substitution, with Jairo Riedewald replacing James McArthur.
In the minute 74, Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
Jordan Ayew is on a sub for Jeffrey Schlupp for Crystal Palace.
Goal kick for West Bromwich at The Hawthorns.
In the minute 80, West Bromwich are pushing forward but Filip Krovinovic's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in West Bromwich.
Slaven Bilic is making the team's third substitution at The Hawthorns with Dara O'Shea replacing Romaine Sawyers.
In the minute 81, The away team have replaced Wilfried Zaha with Michy Batshuayi. This is the third substitution made today by Roy Hodgson.
Christian Benteke puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 1-5.
Nathaniel Clyne instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 84, Filip Krovinovic for West Bromwich gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Paul Tierney awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to West Bromwich.
In the minute 88, West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luka Milivojevic (Crystal Palace) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to West Bromwich in their own half.
West Bromwich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to West Bromwich.
Kyle Bartley (West Bromwich) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Paul Tierney awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
Throw-in for West Bromwich at The Hawthorns.
The match is over. Final score 1-5.
